messages.title: Your Messages
messages.summary: Your Facebook data contains {{messages}} messages from {{threads}} chats with {{people}} people.
report.success: Your report was sent to us. Thank you!
report.error: Your report could not be sent. Please try again!
unrecognizedCard.headline: We need your help!
unrecognizedCard.text: If you send us an anonymised report about the structure of your Facebook data, it would help us improve Facebook Import so that it can show you even more insights.
